message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm willing to part with it for $115.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for a bit more than that. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $107.50?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still can't go above $100 for this product. Would you be willing to lower your price?
